content.detailedDescription:
1.  riding in card with 3 other people, heading south on eastside highway.
2.  looking at orion's belt.
3.  i commented to the other 3 in the car, "look, i've never seen those 2 stars before; do any of you know what they are?"
4.  star-like, very bright; from our viewpoint to the left and below orion's belt about 2 feet, the objects appeared about 2 inches apart.  no motion or movement, no sound.
5.  we all kept looking at the objects and all agreed that none of us had ever seen those 2 "stars."
6.  the objects faded: the one on the right faded first, then the one on the left faded.  no clouds in the sky and no change in being able to view near by objects such as orion's belt.
content.summary: Below orion's belt, 2 star-like lights; right one faded then left faded

content.detailedDescription: I was in my sisters room on the phone to my boyfriend looking out at the pitch black sky when a red flashing light caught my eye above the houses oppisite. it was 6.22pm on the 1/2/12. when i first saw the flying object i thought it was a plane because it seemed to be in the same flight path as planes when they fly past. i waited to see the green light when it turned a different angle but it didnt. it stayed flashing red. i called my sister up to have a look when she noticed there was another red flashing object around the same height above some houses a little bit further along. it started working its way along towards the other red flashing light at a smooth speed. then the first light flashed two red lights at the same speed as before. we both went downstairs and told our mum and dad when we were explaining it came back around again. we all rushed upstairs turned the lights off so we could see it better and we noticed 3 red flashing objects hovering in the sky this time, working there way along the same path as before. this time there was some sort of plane in the sky. this could be a possible witness as it wasn't far from the objects. the first red flashing object started flashing two red lights again as the other two made there way along flashing just one. eventually the went out of sight and did not manage to see them again.
content.summary: 5 flying objects flashing red within 10 mins on 1/2/12 at 6.22

content.detailedDescription: I was going home on hickory level rd from villa rica, i came around curve and this ufo was hovering over the large pasture on the road. it was not much higher than the treetops. the shape was sort of like the egyptian eye in hieroglyphs. the dome on top came almost to  a point,the bottom rounded the middle was visibly more clear with two large bright lights on either side. the craft looked like it was 3 sections. the top had red lights on the right side, the left  was green, the bottm the light were opposite and randomly flashing. it stayed with me for approx 2 to 2 1/2miles. when no sound. i couldn't pull over because of the mud so when i had a chance ir  turned around and it took off. strange thing is on fri my daughter, who lives in villa rica said she saw basically the same thing from their porch on the previous sat.
content.summary: Driving home, caame around curve and it was hovering over cow pasture, stayed with me for approx 2 1/2 miles,

content.detailedDescription:
Yo estaba en la antigua guatemala en una capacitaci���n en la agencia espa���ola de cooperaci���n internacional para el desarrollo (aecid).  

a la hora del almuerzo sal��� a caminar por la ciudad y tomar fotograf���as de las calles y edificios hit���ricos con mi celular nokia 5800 xpressmusic. 

la fotograf���a adjunta es del efificio de la municipalidad de la antigua guatemala, se pueden ver las banderas de guatemala y de la municipalidad en lo alto del edificio.  en ese momento no me percat��� de que hab���a fotografiado un ovni.

luego en la noche traslad��� las fotograf���as del tel���fono celular a la laptop y me dispuse a observarlas con cuidado y fue hasta ese momento que vi el ovni con forma de tri���ngulo.

el parecido del ovni con un bombardero b2 spirit es asombroso.
content.summary: Ufo over la antigua guatemala may 19, 2010 at noon approx

content.detailedDescription: It was about 3am. i was in my bedroom on the second floor looking out the window stargazing. there was a fool moon out and observed the stars for a short time . then walked away for bout 10 minutes or so when i came back to the window i observed a star in the lower sky that i did not see previously it was a little higher the tree top height. it was a luminous white that pulsated red and blue or green i watched this through 4 power binos for a better part of a hour. i went to lay down in bed for bout 10 minutes and i got back up and went to my window and seen this object was moving lower in the treeline and away south west towards philly.
content.summary: Super bright white red green

content.detailedDescription:
1/22/2012 visiting with friends in ft. lauderdale, fl (sunrise)taking random pictures of the sites.  i noticed after i came home and looked at the pictures that out of the thousands i took that day, 63 of them had a blue orb that moved around throughout those 63.

it was about three hours between the 63 pictures, as they were not taken in succession.  beautiful day, clear and cloudy sky.  i was very surprised when i saw it in the pictures and needed to report it.
content.summary: Ft. lauderdale hovering blue orb ufo 01-22-2012

content.detailedDescription: Monday feb 4, 2012. i was getting ready for work when i looked out the back window (facing south). it was 4 am and i was going to check the weather outside. i noticed a faint star moving along the horizon and then it started to ascend at an angle towards the east. it was moving like a skater would when he pushes off with one skate and then coasts to a stop. then another pulse of energy and a coast to a stop. then i noticed 2 more in the sky doing the same type of motion. i watched them for about 5 to 8 minutes. this is my 5th confirmed sighting in the last 2 years. just then a brighter light lifted off from what appeared to be the international airport located near leduc,south and west of me. this i though may be an airplane and was wondering if the ufo's would react to it. to my amazment the bright white light started moving straight up an in less than one second it arced over my location, flying over top of sherwood park, headed north. as it flew over my house it changed from white to red and was gone. i have seen these things before, but as single entities. seeing so many at once i felt vulnerable and frightened.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 ufo's south of sherwood park searching or observing

content.detailedDescription:
A little after 5am on january 27-2012 i went outside with my dog.  it was cold ( in the -20s ) and clear, no wind.  the back of my home faces north and in the sky about 20-25 degrees above the horizon a star like object where there shouldn't have been a bright star.  i am an amateur astronomer and noticed the object immediately.
 
the constellation cassiopeia was to my right and the star capella to my left. in a 180 degree arc of my position the object was the brightest object in the sky, it was about twice the size of capella.

after observing for about 15 seconds the object blinked out much like a large spotlight would, fading out quickly.

the strange part of it was that it took my eyes a second or so to adjust to the background as it should have been. it was as if i was looking through distorted glass and then everything became abruptly clear.
the dog did nothing out of the ordinary, there was no sound,no smell and no time lost. i was not disoriented in any way.....Just a feeling of astonishment.

i am 66 years old, live close to an airport and this was definitely not an aircraft.  it was not a chinese lantern.  it was not a planet, it was not a star.  it was something i have never seen before.
content.summary: Star like, twice size of capella,in area of sky where there shouldn't be a star ?
content.locationName: Happy Valley-Goose Bay, Newfoundland and Lab

content.detailedDescription: I took some random pictures with my camera,of some storm clouds around the time a tornado hit in springfield ma in 2011.I did not see the object until i looked at the photos on my phone.It definitely does not look like a plane.I have no idea what it may be.
content.summary: Noticed object after taking photo,

content.detailedDescription: I was in north long beach, i was watching battlefield la, and on facebook literally writing a post about some kind of alien invasion scenario happening, before i finished writing i got a call from my buddy in san diego telling me to go outside and check out the moon ( things seem to happen synchronistically like this), i went outide with my ex-wife, but didnt notice the circular object he was describing, my problem, i was looking at too small of a radius, after about 3 minutes i realized the cloud formation he was describing was in a larger area than where i was looking. it was completely translucent, but the perfectly circular clouds made its shape very clear, it was a giant perfectly formed donut cloud,with a huge open center. very similar to the moscow and romania ufo sightings, but less dense and defined, with a much larger center and a thinner but larger radius of surrounding clouds.My ex-wife stayed outside watching it while i ran inside to get my dad. it was gone when i came back outside, and left a larger trail of clouds behind it. also after the circular cloud dispersed i noticed a small ufo light ( probe or individual craft) where the center of the cloud previously was. the light was moving to fast and was too high up to be a plane, it wasn't flashing either. after that returned inside because activity ceased. the clouds lost there circular shape and drifted off, but they retained a perfect circle for the 10 minutes i observed it, and at least 15 minutes before my observation, by my friend in san diego.
content.summary: Large cloaked mothership, with surrounding cloud cover, directly below the moon

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Me and two friends were walking up the dunes on the beach. shortly after one friend spotted the first craft and said "is that a satellite?" the craft then proceeded to descend from space to around 30-50 feet above us, flashed a huge white light on us and then flew off into space again.

another 5 crafts could be seen in space with the original craft appearing in random locations then following each other on the same flight course.

a large orange orb appeared on the horizon about the same size as a full moon and hung there for about 15 min.

another star on the horizon started to pulsate growing in size as large as a full moon and contracting into near invisibility.

the crafts were all headed on a tangent towards the pulsating craft on the horizon and as we were watching that the other orange orb had vanished.
content.summary: Small fleet + 2 large crafts.

content.detailedDescription: My wife was driving my truck home on amwell road traveling east when i noticed a glowing light out the front windshield of my truck. i aways watch the sky night and day and am very familiar with aircraft. this immediately looked strange to me , like a flare glowing orange. i said to my wife  "what is that" and knew it was close because the perspective was moving very quickly to the drivers side of the truck threw the windshield. by the time she had time to look it was out of my line of sight ,but she was able to look out the driver side door window and see it. we pulled off into the parking lot of the hillsborough high school and exited the truck to see if we could observer the object again. to our surprise the object, which seemed to be going the opposite direction of us was now traveling towards us. it could of been going in our direction the whole time but it would have been traveling slower then us because we over took it. when i stepped out of the truck and saw it again it did not appear to make any sound. i went back to the truck and turned it off and grabbed my camera to take some video. i took a couple of quick videos but is hard to make out with no perspective in them . my wife also used her cell phone to take a picture and a quick video. the object seemed to gain altitude and then went from a fussy glowing ball to small pin of light before disappearing into the night sky. i am very familiar with aircraft, stars, planets, meteors, and hoax chinese lanterns. this was not any of them. it did not appear to be an aircraft of any type either. it seemed to be a flare or light behind a cloud, but there where no clouds. it was also very close because the way it was seen from the windshield (far off objects do not travel across your field of vision that quick). i am sending 2 quick videos of the object and a quick video of some aircraft in the area. i am also wondering if any body else observed this
content.summary: Strange light in sky that moved and changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out of my bedroom window, i see across the southern and western most point of monterey bay in california. i see trees, the ocean, the mountains across the bay and a lighthouse from my sliding glass doors that lead from the bedroom to the deck. my wife and i have each had a sighting within the last year and a half. both were accompanied by our power browning out.

my sighting of mid january this year is very similar to a video that was posted 1/12/12 at the website, "the truth behind the scenes." this was filmed in brazil. yet, the lights looked at times almost exactly like those i witnessed. at first, i thought that someone had left their christmas lights up and perhaps a wind chime on my deck was reflecting them. the main reason i speculated this was that these lights appeared to be about a half dozen in a line, separated much like christmas lights on a string. and these lights were different colors. they also would appear for perhaps a minute, then go away for a similar period of time, only to repeat this many times. the entire sighting probably lasted at least twenty minutes. and this "string" of lights always was slanted at about 30 degrees to the right from straight down. if on a clock face and these lights made up the big hand, they would have pointed to the four. i tried to wake my wife, but she seemed as if she could not wake up. 

these lights would appear and disappear and i imagined that they might be a reflection from a spinning wind chime. however, looking the next day, there are no chimes in that area of our deck. after a considerable amount of time, they disappeared and did not reappear with the regularity they had been. then, very suddenly there appeared very bright yellowish lights just behind the trees that looked like they could be a low flying plane going down the beach to the south. however, there was no sound. if it were a plane, i would definitely have heard it as it was really quite close. i see planes approaching our airport all the time. they always approach from the same direction, which is also the direction these lights came from. and i always hear them when they are much farther away than these lights were. last but not least, as soon as this last object flew by, the lights in the room dimmed to a glow for just a few seconds. however, they looked just as they did when my wife saw her uso. at that time, oct of 2010, the brownout effect lasted almost an hour.

i hesitate to report this due to our location and the many government facilities located in our area, such as the naval postgraduate school, the defense language institute, the monterey institute for international studies, and the fact that this is the home town of the u.S. secretary of defense, leon panetta. consequently, i suspect there is a better than average chance that if the government wants to clandestinely show off some new equipment, it is not unreasonable to assume it might show up here.

i would not have made this report if not for that video i observed that looked so much like what i saw.
content.summary: Very similar to brazilian ufo video of 1/12/12

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to walk my dog just after the super bowl was over. i viewed an amber color object slowly moving across the sky between 1000ft and what ever the reported cloud level was at the time of the sighting. the reason i am sure of the altitude is that an airplane (airliner e.G. a b-717) appeared to be at traffic pattern altitude downwind for rwy 24 at rsw. if that object was on radar that object would be at the aircrafts 12-3 o'clock high position. there were four other objects prior before said aircraft entered the pattern. all five objects were about two and a half minutes apart like they were all following each other. they then disappeared as they ascended into the clouds. there were no navigation lgts (e.G. red, green or white and no strobes.) i am a professional in the aviation industry and i was unable to idenify what characteristic(s) it was. if it was a faa approved aircraft it had non-standard lighting. this is the first time i have witnessed a ufo(s).
content.summary: Viewed a total of five amber lights at one at a time about 2 min apart coming from the se to the nw

content.detailedDescription: Me, my neighbor and his 10 year old son had just finished watching the super bowl at my house.  as we were standing out front of my house, looking south as we talked, a very bright green, almost laser-like green orb appeared out of nowhere at about 40 degrees in the horizon, traveling from the east to the west.  the orb continued on an arc-like path toward the ground.  two houses down is a two story home and we lost sight of it as it fell.  this object had no trail behind it, just a very bright green orb.  less than a half-mile from my home to the south is a raytheon space and air systems complex and it appeared to have fallen exactly at this place.  my neighbor was looking away but his son and i saw the whole thing.  this happened at approximately 9:30 p.M..  i am regularly seeing strange objects in the sky in north texas but this is the first time i have reported any of them and it is the first time i have ever seen an object like this.  there is no doubt in my mind that this object came down to the ground somewhere either on the raytheon property or very close to it just south of my house.
content.summary: Witnessed a very bright glowing orb descend on an arc-like path to ground

content.detailedDescription: I just entered maint street from the grocery store at main street and 15 freeway and this blue-green bright ligt caught my eye. the object was size of an asperin, traveling south and when i first say it it was over north victorville (8-9 miles north of main street and 15 freeway entersection)and within 60 seconds it disapeard due to the distance traveled was no longer in my vision.
content.summary: Traveling at a speed i didnt think possible

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were traveling north i79 from grove city on aug 25th to go camping at virginia���s on the beach which is a lake side camp ground on lake eire, pa. my wife was driving so i was taking advantage of being a passenger and was looking out the window at the sky. as we got closer to lake eire i noticed that there were a few out of place abnormally looking orange stars and commented on them. i was trying to determine if they were planets or stars or whatever they were when i saw what i thought was a shooting star and as i was about to announce it, it changed direction and stopped which really got my attention. we pulled off the interstate and stopped near the intersections of interstate 79 and 90 so i could take some pictures. i took some photos but it was really out of the reach of my 280mm lens so nothing earth shattering came out of that. it was near midnight at the time when those photos were taken. we got back in the car and proceeded on. we were letting the gps guide is to the campground which was west of eire about ��� ways between erie and conneaut ohio. as we proceeded we ended up on west lake road route 5 traveling west looking for the camp ground when i saw another shooting star thing that just stopped dead in the air off to the southwest. 

we pulled over again so i could take more photos. this time it was much closer. my wife, step-son and step-niece and i all got out of the car to look at this thing while i grabbed my camera to photograph it. i was facing southwest and its flight path was eastward.  as i focused on this thing with my camera i thought to myself i���m getting way better shots but i wish it was closer. before i could think another thought in a split second this thing was right over top of us almost as if it read my mind. i was caught up in the moment photographing it but it really scared my wife, step-son and step-niece almost to tears because it moved so weird and approached us like that and i freaked out later. i was able to get some really crazy and descent photos of this thing especially for night shots of a moving object. this thing was house sized but the brightness of the lights made it difficult to make out object���s outline. it made no sound per say but what we did hear could be best described as an electrical buzzing sound like the ones you might hear in those old scifi movies in mad scientist laboratory. i know that sounds like a goofy description but that is what it sounded like. it had 3 very bright lights no blinking lights or marking lights at all that would be on conventional air craft. and after it slowly flew by us at about tree top height it changed direction northward sped up and flew off. it went very quickly and disappeared towards the direction of lake eire. 

we ended up lost in conneaut ohio and stopped at this convenience store to regroup and find the camp ground. we were talking about the event and the clerk over heard us. she said we see that all kind of stuff all the time here. if you are here for week you���ll see it at least once. she said many people see it near the power plant by the lake along with other strange lights. heck most locals don���t even report them or give it a second thought it���s so normal anymore.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: An object with 3 very bright lights at tree top height. lights made hard to see structure

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the object flying fairly low over interstate 65 while driving my truck through louisville, ky between 2:15-2:30 am friday the 3rd of feb. i was heading southbound about 2-1/2 miles south of the big bridge coming in from indiana. the object was about 700-1000 feet in the air, moving fairly slowly, and was moving southbound just east of the interstate. as it was traveling it was also drifting from east to west. i was actually able to keep up with it at approximately 55mph. at first i thought it was a small plane, but rolled down my window and heard no noise other then the other traffic. also, there were lights (will make an ascii sketch below) at the tips/ends? of the object that changed from red to white in colour, but alternating, (when one end was red, the other was white). in-between the ends of the object was a sequence of lights that chased from left to right, then from the middle to the ends, then from right to left and repeated again, i have no idea what the shape of the object was as it was dark out, but estimating from the height and distance from where i was driving and as it was moving back and forth across the interstate as i paced it, i would have to say that it was most likely 80-100 feet in size.

here is the pattern of lights that i saw:

 *  |||||||  * 

the asterisks are the end lights that were alternating from red to white, almost like the lights on a squad car, and the bars are the ones that acted almost like chasers, those lights were red in colour)

i saw this object for about 5 minutes or so, then it just faded, it did not head off in a direction, or zoom off, it simply faded. i should add that it did appear to be maintaining it's altitude, neither going up or down, just heading south and slowly moving to and fro across interstate.
content.summary: Object seen with blinking lights on corners/ends that alternated colour, sequence of lights between ends, slowly zig-zagging across interstate 65

content.detailedDescription: Ok here i go .....I remember waving goodbye to a saucer  disk like flying thing it had rotating lights around the middle i remember blue red yellow..And i remember being with my sister and my parents...There is hardly a day that goes by when i still dont think about this....But they dont seem to remember this....Around the same year or so i remember running out to see if santa came ...And i remember seeing 3  aliens...And i seem to remember them being a brownish in color...Like a light brown color....And about the same height i was when i was a kid...Three to four feet...But i remember no more after i first see them..Then in or around the year 2000....I was living in coram ny...It was around 5 am  i was on my way to work (i drove a garbage truck)  i lived in a high ranch i walked down the stairs  my car was parked in the street...As i was walking to my car inbetween my house and my neighbors house i noticed a orb it had a white flourecesent color around the size of a small beach ball...Any way as i looked at for a few seconds it shot straight up and then it twinkled and then looked like the rest of the stars in the sky...And that was it..
content.summary: I remember waving goodbye...I remember being with my sister and parents

content.detailedDescription: we were coming up our driveway roughly around 8:30 at night when we saw three distinct orange lights in a formation that looked like orion's belt head on. we shocked, so we neglected to take picture or film until afterwards. we thought it was and airplane at first. we (my son and i) stopped the car to see if there was any movement. there was absolutly no movement whatsoever. at the distence we were, if the object were an airplane we would have at least seen a little bit of movement, even if it were coming at us head on. the object appeard to be hovering. as we continued up our driveway, the object dipped behind our roof. when we got to our car port, my son asked to be let out of the car. he then went to our back yard to get a better view. he told me that the object was descending and flying toward the northeast. he described the object as looking almost like a boomerang and flying smoothly, although not nearly as fast as a normal airplane. he said the object made absolutly no noise. this is what made me relize that this was probably not an airplane, since as low as this object was there would have definatly been at least a low roar. my son said that he didn't feel scared, but he did have a bit of an eerie feeling. he described it as being in wonder of what the object was. he explained that the object had started moving when he got to where he could see it. he told me that it had started to move off toward the northeast and began to drop in altitude. when he told me this my suspicions began to rise again that this object was an airplane coming in for a landing, but he also told me that this object was changing direction irradically. we lost sight of the object when it disappeard behind the tree line. i feel sure it wasn't a helicopter as it had three lights in a boomerang formation. the object also shared few characteristicts with a plane. my son told me that from the side the three lights were almost lined up, the middle light barely being in front of the other two. we see lots of planes and we know how they behave, and this behaved nothing like one, nor looked like one. our dogs normally bark if an airplane is going overhead, and our dogs didn't even notice this flying object. this object was different than anything we've ever seen, and felt that it needed reported.
content.summary: Hovered. descended behind roof. moved off toward northeast.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my downtown los angeles loft looking out of my giant 12ft. windows. the sky's are perfectly clear on this superbowl sunday. i noticed what at first looked like a white balloon floating upwards in the distance. as i continued to watch this object, i noticed that it would stop and hover and then change directions as if something was guiding it. at one point it stopped and hovered then began to ascend directly upwards near a cloud.  then suddenly, another orb appeared however, it was flashing or blinking.  as they moved closer to each other, several other orbs began to suddenly appear from out of nowhere.  i couldn't believe my eyes. they all seemed to be communicating with each other while moving close to each other.  i then noticed several birds, both black and white that were flying up near the orbs.  the birds seemed to follow and notice the presence of the orbs as they would fly in the same direction of the orb as it moved about. i was able to record what i saw however, the video quality is very poor as i was using my nearby ipad2.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: White orb flying and changing directions, then joined by at least six others that where solid white/bright or flashing white.

content.detailedDescription: In november of 1998 i left my parents house to go home at around 1am. my younger brother had died a couple weeks before and i was going to spend the night with my mom who was severly depressed but my husband called to say our son was ill so i decided to make the hour and a half drive home. about 10 minutes into my trip home, i noticed an extremily bright, white light in the sky coming from the basic direction of where i was going. the road i was on was desolate and there was no other traffic so i found myself watching this light as i was driving. at first i thought is was a plane with it's front light coming toward me for i knew it was way too bright to be a star or planet. i noticed though that it was staying in the same place for the entire time i was driving on the back roads. it made me feel very uneasy but at the time i didn't know why. coming off the main road i was taking, i started down a 5 lane highway going east. i saw the light was getting closer but that it was also growing dimmer. i knew there was no way that it was a beacon or tower for i had been steadily watching this light for 45 minutes. as i was coming closer to my exit i could see that this object was actually a row of bright pulsating lights of red, orange, yellow, blue, and green. i just remember being completely confused and fearful for as i stared at this object i almost drove into a ditch. braking completely, i stopped on the side of the road just watching this thing trying to comprehend and understand exactly what it was i was seeing. as i watched for aprox. 1 minute the object suddenly started to rotate at a 90 degree turn. whereas it was a horizontal object, it was now becoming vertical. this motion completely terrified me. i just knew immediately that what i was seeing was something unnatural and just the sheer unusualness of what it what doing scared me enough that i looked away, slammed on the accelerater and flew down my exit. i regret this decision for i have spent the last 14 years wondering what else this object did after i sped away, as well as what the object was to begin with. on my way home after seeing this i turned on the radio right away, flipping through stations, sure that i would hear something about what i saw. even though there were no other cars that i remember seeing i was sure that someone, anyone must have been awake to see this object as well. when i got home i ran in the house to tell my husband what i saw and he immediately thought it was a helicopter or an airplane. i wanted him to drive back that night with me to see if it was still there but because of our son being sick we didn't. i read every line, everyday in the newspaper hoping to see that someone else had seen and reported it so that i could also come forward. but of course nothing. i know for a 100% fact that what i saw was not a conventional aircraft. i am not some crackpot looking for attention for i don't want any. i am a married woman with 6 children, no psychiatric problems, was not drinking or doing drugs, and was not tired or hallucinating the night i saw this. the main reason i have come forward after all this time is because of a ufo documentary that i was watching recently where i saw an incident in texas where a man saw an object hovering in the sky. as a matter of fact when i saw the re-enactment of his object rotating at a 90% angle it kind of took my breath away for i am certain that what i saw was the same object. the one he saw split in two after becoming vertical but i don't know what the one i saw did because of my unfortunate decision to flee and not continue to watch. this incident is something that has bothered me for many years and it's frustrating to me that i don't know what it was to this day.
content.summary: Coming home on us 12 at around 2am saw to my left, hovering about 500ft a long row of pulsating lights that suddenly rotated at a 90 angle.

content.detailedDescription: At a friend's house in sandy, ut at approx. 1600 e and 9400 s, 11:32pm mst.  we walked outside to have a smoke.  as we walked outside i immediately looked up at the sky and saw 3 bright orange-red lights flying in a southwesterly direction.  as they flew they came together in a triangular formation and appeared to remain stationary for a about a minute.  they then proceeded in a more north-northwesterly direction.  as they proceeded in this direction, the two 'bottom' lights in the formation began to fade out.  the top light continued to illuminate for about another 1-1.5 mintutes and then it faded out as well.  no noise was present.  they were at least a mile or so away from where we were standing.  this was witnessed by myself and 3 other people.
content.summary: Saw 3 bright orange-red lights flying slowly in triangular formation.

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen an orb-like light/craft on 3 occasions now, in the same place. my partner has seen it too. it is very slow moving and has even been stationary/hovering. it seems to change shape or pulsate into other shapes. it is about house height but obviously is a couple of miles away in the distance but it is a lot lower than any star. this object seemed to be stationary for a few minutes last night and then i noticed another object which at first i thought was an aircraft come directly in line with the orb. this craft then flew round to the east of where we were and came directly towards us. it's lights were the brightest white you could imagine, not like aircraft landing lights. brighter, as if burning bright white. there were a number of bright red lights on it too, they were not flashing. there appeared to be a red colour on the craft but can't be sure if this was just the light reflection. the craft was grey. like a cross shape, but when i try to describe what the actual shape was, i can't! i know in my mind what it was like but haven't got the words to describe exactly! there were a few of the white lights on it and about 4 of the red ones. it passed straight over our heads about 800 feet straight upwards. there is an airport right near us called east midlands airport, so i am making my height estimation on what i normally see going in to the airport. me and my partner watched the craft. it didn't take the flight path of a landing aeroplane it went on it's own course. it definately did not go toward the airoprt it carried on flying west almost south west and appeared to maintain the same altitude throughout. there was noise with this craft but it was very quiet and totally different to that of the usual crafts that pass over here on a daily basis. it was a cloud-free, clear, cold night and the noise the craft made was just like a bit of a whirring noise, not recognisable to me or my partner.
the orb craft finally flew in to the distance as did the one that flew above our heads.
content.summary: 2 crafts. 1 seen on 3 occasions in same area. one disappeared then one flew straight over my head about 800ft in the air.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside before bed to have a smoke and was looking up at the night sky. it was a very clear night. i noticed a dark object moving north to south but it didn't have blinking lights like airplanes. i assumed it was a low satellite so i just watched it. it turned abruptly southeast. not swooping and gradually like airplanes. like a straight line, abrupt 30-45 angle then straight again.Right after it turned several dim/cloudy objects appeared on the dark objects origional path. they swirled around and disappeared. because that caught my eye i couldn't relocate the dark object. because it was clear and there was no lights so i couldn't judge the distance. when the glowing objects appeared the whole event seemed closer but still at a good distance. i live close to omaha's airport and landing path so i know what the distance and sound of takeoff/landing planes are. also offutt airforce base is about 15-20 miles southwest of here. military planes are rarely seen on this side of omaha metro area. compared to airliners that fly high overhead (i'm meaning coast to coast commercial flights)if this was similar distance up it's rate of speed was 2 to 3 times faster as airplanes can be observed for close to a minute. i didn't notice a vapor trail from the dark object. no noise, but airplanes really high you can't hear either. i observed the whole event. my then girlfriend (now wife) walked out just as the glowing lights appeared swirled then disappeared. she said "wow, did you see that" she said she saw 7 or 8 lights swirl. she never noticed the dark object. it seemed like 5 to 6 lights to me though, but the swirling lights only took maybe 1-3 seconds. the whole event to about 15 seconds. if it wasn't for the swirling lights, it wouldn't seem out of the ordinary to me. the swirl was like objects around a drain, all moving the same direction and speed. they glowed like a flashlite in fog, but it was perfectly clear. the dark object was far away enough so i could not make out a shape.
content.summary: Saw a dark object moving then glowing objects appear/disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm driving toward staten island on the bqe (brooklyn queens expressway).
i've just past the hamilton avenue exit in a section known as the gowanus. 
i'm driving in the right lane, parallel to the east river by the southern tip of manhattan, where the ferry's launch. when i notice two diamond shaped lights lulling over the river. helicopters and planes are flying by, it's 7:00pm. i'm driving, its bumper to bumper traffic and i'm looking to my right at these diamond shaped lights. there not moving. there's two of them, just sitting there above the river. it's like they're floating in the air. when all of a sudden, one at a time, the diamond's blink - out. like someone has a camera and just shot a picture with the flash going off. the diamonds are no more. now its some sort of a dark sky colored craft with an oval shaped dome on top with green,white and red lights blinking in succession around the oval. i've just past the prospect expressway exit, continuing on the b q e . i'm coming up to the 36th street exit, all the time watching the oval green,white and red blinking lights, when the two objects start to rise up in the air. slowly at first, then they rise at an enormous speed and disappear in the heavens. i've just past the 36th street exit, on the b q e when the traffic loosens up and i'm driving at 45mph. then i notice, traffic slowing down to a stand still. the police are up ahead diverting traffic to the left. there's a car accident near my exit. i get-off at the 6th avenue exit. again, i notice those diamond lights floating off to the right. there are 2 to my immediate right and one in between these two high-rise buildings by the 6th avenue exit. again, helicopters are flying by along with planes. cause of the traffic accident, there are helicopters with their search beams on illuminating the vehicles involved with the traffic accident.With all this going on, the three diamonds are lulling above the copters. its like they we're there watching the procedure of the police, ambulance and the helicopters. the helicopters are flying by them, below them and above them and they don't notice these three diamond lights in the vicinity. all of a sudden, two of the diamonds blink-out & turn into the dark ovals with the green,white and red blinking lights. they rise in the air, straight up and disappear at an enormous speed. the third diamond, i observe, the one in between the buildings starts moving toward the verrazano bridge. where it links up with five other diamonds floating above the bridge. it takes a position equalateral to the others, forming a chevron shape , above the verrazano bridge. now i can see a total of six diamonds, not moving. they're just there, above and to the right of the bridge. i'm now waived on by the police and immediately get off the b q e at the 6th avenue exit. the exit is around 500 ft. from the accident scene. i drive down the ramp and make a right onto 6th avenue. the diamond lights in the sky are now out of my view. looking back , it looked just like the lights seen in phoenix . that bowed light above the city.
 i've seen these diamonds on two other occasions in the past 3 months.
content.summary: Objects seen in two locations along bqe. 1st at tip of manhatten and then hovering over varrazano bridge
